1370: Euerocker was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Sophia at age 20 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Sophia, Breghlent, at age 20.
1371: Had a son with Sophia, Gheuardus, at age 21.
1372: Had a daughter with Sophia, Sarre, at age 22.
1373: Had a daughter with Sophia, Walburgis, at age 23.
1374: Had a son with Sophia, Woutgerus, at age 24.
Lost son Woutgerus when Woutgerus was 1 years old.
1375: Had a daughter with Sophia, Cecilia, at age 25.
1379: Lost son Splinter when Splinter was 0 years old.
Sophia gave birth to their stillborn son Splinter in 1379.
1385: Lost daughter Siburgis when Siburgis was 0 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Sophia gave birth to their stillborn daughter Siburgis in 1385.
1390: Lost daughter Walburgis when Walburgis was 18 years old.
